SELECT A.NTT_ID AS board_no, A.BBS_ID, EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM VST_NTT D WHERE D.PARNTSCTT_ID = A.NTT_ID) PARNTSCTT_ID, A.NTT_SJ AS board_title, A.RDCNT, A.SECRET_AT, A.NOTICE_AT, A.NTT_CN AS board_content, A.NTT_STTS AS board_status, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') insert_dt, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS insert_id, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') update_dt, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID AS update_id, (SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID FROM VST_ATCHFILE T WHERE T.UPPER_ID = A.NTT_ID ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_ID LIMIT 1) AS atch_file_id, IFNULL(B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, '') file_name, C.FILE_DISPLAY_AT, C.CARD_AT FROM VST_NTT A LEFT OUTER JOIN VST_ATCHFILE B ON A.NTT_ID = B.UPPER_ID AND B.FILE_SE = 'thumb' LEFT OUTER JOIN VST_BBS C ON A.BBS_ID = C.BBS_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.BBS_ID = #{board_type} AND A.USE_AT = 'Y'
and (A.NTT_SJ like CONCAT('%', #{sSearch}, '%') or A.NTT_CN like CONCAT('%', #{sSearch}, '%') )
order by ${orderCol} ${sSortDir_0},A.NTT_ID desc
order by A.NTT_ID desc
limit ${iDisplayStart}, ${iDisplayLength}

SELECT count(C.NTT_ID) FROM ( SELECT A.NTT_ID FROM VST_NTT A LEFT OUTER JOIN VST_ATCHFILE B ON A.NTT_ID = B.UPPER_ID AND B.FILE_SE = 'ntt' WHERE A.BBS_ID = #{board_type} AND A.USE_AT = 'Y'
and (A.NTT_SJ like CONCAT('%', #{sSearch}, '%') or A.NTT_CN like CONCAT('%', #{sSearch}, '%') )
GROUP BY A.NTT_ID ) C

SELECT VN.NTT_ID, VN.NTT_SJ, VN.WRTER_NM, VN.THUMB_URL, VN.FRST_REGIST_DT, VN.RDCNT, IF(VN.SECRET_AT = 'Y', TRUE, FALSE) AS SECRET, IF(VN.NOTICE_AT = 'Y', TRUE, FALSE) AS NOTICE, IF(REPLY.NTT_ID IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) AS REPLY FROM VST_NTT VN LEFT OUTER JOIN VST_NTT REPLY ON VN.NTT_ID = REPLY.PARNTSCTT_ID WHERE VN.BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND VN.PARNTSCTT_ID IS NULL AND VN.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND VN.NTT_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND VN.WRTER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (VN.NTT_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR VN.WRTER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY VN.NTT_ID DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VST_NTT VN LEFT OUTER JOIN VST_NTT REPLY ON VN.NTT_ID = REPLY.PARNTSCTT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN VST_MBR MBR ON VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID = MBR.MBR_ID WHERE VN.BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND VN.PARNTSCTT_ID IS NULL AND VN.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VST_REPORT VR WHERE VR.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VR.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID ) <= 3
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB WHERE VB.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VB.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VB.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB2 WHERE VB2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VB2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VB2.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND VN.NTT_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND VN.WRTER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (VN.NTT_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR VN.WRTER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))

SELECT VN.NTT_ID, VN.NTT_SJ, VN.NTT_CN, CAST(DATE_FORMAT(VN.FRST_REGIST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CHAR) AS FRST_REGIST_DT, VN.WRTER_NM, (VN.RDCNT + 1) RDCNT, VN.START_DT, VN.END_DT, IF(VN.NOTICE_AT = 'Y', TRUE, FALSE) AS NOTICE, IF(VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID IS NULL, TRUE, FALSE) ANONYMOUS_WRITER, VA.ATCH_FILE_ID, CONCAT(VA.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, '.' , VA.FILE_EXTSN) AS ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM VST_NTT VN LEFT OUTER JOIN VST_ATCHFILE VA ON VN.NTT_ID = VA.UPPER_ID WHERE VN.NTT_ID = #{nttId} AND VN.USE_AT = 'Y'

( SELECT NTT_ID, NTT_SJ, 'prev' AS VIEW_TYPE FROM ( SELECT NTT_ID, NTT_SJ FROM VST_NTT WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND NTT_ID < #{nttId} ORDER BY NTT_ID DESC LIMIT 1 ) t1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT NTT_ID, NTT_SJ, 'next' AS VIEW_TYPE FROM ( SELECT NTT_ID, NTT_SJ FROM VST_NTT WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND NTT_ID > #{nttId} ORDER BY NTT_ID ASC LIMIT 1 ) t2 )

SELECT (SELECT NTT_ID FROM VST_NTT VN WHERE NTT_ID < #{nttId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND BBS_ID = (SELECT BBS_ID FROM VST_NTT WHERE NTT_ID = #{nttId}) AND PARNTSCTT_ID IS NULL
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB WHERE VB.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VB.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VB.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB2 WHERE VB2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VB2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VB2.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
ORDER BY NTT_ID DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_id, (SELECT NTT_SJ FROM VST_NTT VN WHERE NTT_ID < #{nttId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND BBS_ID = (SELECT BBS_ID FROM VST_NTT WHERE NTT_ID = #{nttId}) AND PARNTSCTT_ID IS NULL
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB WHERE VB.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VB.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VB.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB2 WHERE VB2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VB2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VB2.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
ORDER BY NTT_ID DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_sj, (SELECT SECRET_AT FROM VST_NTT VN WHERE NTT_ID < #{nttId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND BBS_ID = (SELECT BBS_ID FROM VST_NTT WHERE NTT_ID = #{nttId}) AND PARNTSCTT_ID IS NULL
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB WHERE VB.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VB.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VB.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB2 WHERE VB2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VB2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VB2.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
ORDER BY NTT_ID DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_secret, (SELECT NTT_ID FROM VST_NTT VN WHERE NTT_ID > #{nttId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND BBS_ID = (SELECT BBS_ID FROM VST_NTT WHERE NTT_ID = #{nttId}) AND PARNTSCTT_ID IS NULL
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB WHERE VB.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VB.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VB.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB2 WHERE VB2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VB2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VB2.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
ORDER BY NTT_ID LIMIT 1) AS next_id, (SELECT NTT_SJ FROM VST_NTT VN WHERE NTT_ID > #{nttId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND BBS_ID = (SELECT BBS_ID FROM VST_NTT WHERE NTT_ID = #{nttId}) AND PARNTSCTT_ID IS NULL
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB WHERE VB.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VB.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VB.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB2 WHERE VB2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VB2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VB2.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
ORDER BY NTT_ID LIMIT 1) AS next_sj, (SELECT SECRET_AT FROM VST_NTT VN WHERE NTT_ID > #{nttId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND BBS_ID = (SELECT BBS_ID FROM VST_NTT WHERE NTT_ID = #{nttId}) AND PARNTSCTT_ID IS NULL
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB WHERE VB.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VB.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VB.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_BLOCK VB2 WHERE VB2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VB2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VB2.BLOCKER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'mbr' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.FRST_REGISTER_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VST_REPORT VR2 WHERE VR2.TARGET_TYPE = 'ntt' AND VR2.TARGET_ID = VN.NTT_ID AND VR2.REPORTER_ID = #{frstRgstId} )
ORDER BY NTT_ID LIMIT 1) AS next_secret
mapper.update: UPDATE VST_NTT SET RDCNT = RDCNT + 1 WHERE NTT_ID = #{nttId}
